intent_data.goal: Enhance the appliance insurance form with postcode lookup functionality (full address details, editable), brand management system (autocomplete dropdown with 30 biggest brands, "Other" option, admin panel integration), and expanded appliance types (white and brown goods with autocomplete functionality)

requirements.description: Postcode lookup with full address details (editable)
Brand management system with autocomplete dropdown (30 biggest brands, "Other" option, admin panel)
Expanded appliance types (white and brown goods) with autocomplete
Admin panel integration for brand management (CRUD operations)

requirements_summary: 4 requirements total: 3 High priority (postcode lookup, brand management, appliance types expansion) and 1 Medium priority (admin panel integration). All requirements are explicit, clear, and testable. Minor gaps identified: UK postcode API selection, specific list of 30 brands, complete white/brown goods list - these are implementation details, not blocking.

gaps.description: UK postcode lookup API selection needed
Specific list of 30 biggest appliance brands needs research/definition
Complete list of white goods and brown goods appliance types needs expansion

routing_decision.reason: Project is a focused enhancement with well-defined requirements. Single external API integration (postcode lookup) and database management (brands) are straightforward. No complex architecture changes needed.
